price: O, dedi: “Ey Rəbbim! Mən yalnız özümə və qardaşıma hökm edə bilərəm. Odur ki, Sən bizi bu günahkar tayfadan ayır!”
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي لَآ أَمۡلِكُ إِلَّا نَفۡسِي وَأَخِيۖ فَٱفۡرُقۡ بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡفَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī lā amliku illā nafsī wa-akhī fa-uf'ruq baynanā wabayna al-qawmi al-fāsiqīna
